meanings.definition: A set of clothing and accessories for a newborn baby.
meanings.sent1: The layette included tiny socks and a soft blanket for the baby.
meanings.sent2: The new parents received a beautiful layette as a gift for their newborn.
meanings.sent3: The layette was so adorable that it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The layette was like a treasure chest full of tiny wonders for the baby.
meanings.sent5: The layette was carefully packed with love and care for the little one.

meanings.definition: To provide a layette for a newborn baby.
meanings.sent1: The kind neighbor offered to layette the newborn with essentials.
meanings.sent2: The parents decided to layette their baby before the arrival.
meanings.sent3: I will layette the baby with all the necessary items for a cozy welcome.
meanings.sent4: She lovingly layetted the baby, ensuring everything was perfect.
meanings.sent5: The family came together to layette the newborn, preparing for the new journey ahead.
